about_the_game:
Escort Simulator 2 is an immersive real time 3D adult RPG playground where you control the look of a sexy avatar escort exploring the hidden pleasures of a secret Polynesian island. Your imagination is the only limit to the potential fantasies you can explore in this deep and ever changing erotic universe.


Each character contains hundreds of customizable settings, including hair, face and body edits. Level up your character as you explore the island, unlocking new and exotic costumes, swimsuits, and seductive lingerie. Experienced players my even unlock non gender "futa" character, lesbians, and other male characters to party with while staying on the island. Track Avatar experience points and level up to unlock new sexual positions and experiences that will earn you the title of expert escort.




Your character can earn additional in game credits, which can be used to unlock new and exciting locations to meet new friends, purchase in game toys to put on a private cam show, unlock a fully 3D strip club and get a private lap dance from your character, or peek into the hotel shower and get a private glimpse of your favorite companion washing her body from head to toe after an exciting day touring the island.

In-Game Dynamics produce realistic bouncing breasts and jiggling butt cheeks



Escort Simulator 2 improves upon the already popular Escort Simulator sex engine with advanced hair and soft body boob bounce and ass jiggle physics in game, as well as a complete orgasm fluids system for both male, female and futa characters in-game so no one is left without being completely satisfied.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: iOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: iOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
